pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Sunday, February 28, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at a virtual celebration for Black History Month. Minister of Diversity and Inclusion and Youth Bardish Chagger and the Honourable Jean Augustine will also deliver remarks.

The virtual celebration will be streamed on the Department of Canadian Heritage’s Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/CdnHeritage

Media appearance:

9:00 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on NBC’s Meet the Press with Chuck Todd.
